Function Documentation

void @30::intersectLight ( const Vector3 &  opos,
const Vector3 &  npos,
float  orad,
float  nrad,
Chunk &  chunk,
bool  transient,
ChunkCounter &  counter 
) [static]

Given two spheres (an old position and a new position), this will intersect and traverse portals to discover which chunks were intersecting and chunks which are now intersecting.

Uses ref-counts to allow for chunks to accessable via multiple different portal paths.

Helper function to recursively check lights from connected chunks to see if they intersect with portals back to the original chunk (inserting into the given diffuse and specular light containers).
